languages.text: Дабы поражение в джунглях не превратилось в военную катастрофу, мудрейш{mf|ий|ая} Лорд-капитан отдал{mf||а} своевременный приказ о точечной орбитальной бомбардировке планеты. Безжалостные удары обратили в пар скопления повстанцев, вынудив их отступить в островные, не представляющие ценности районы. Увы, под ударом также оказались сельскохозяйственные установки и мощности колонии.

traits.locale_text: Дабы поражение в джунглях не превратилось в военную катастрофу, мудрейш{mf|ий|ая} Лорд-капитан отдал{mf||а} своевременный приказ о точечной орбитальной бомбардировке планеты. Безжалостные удары обратили в пар скопления повстанцев, вынудив их отступить в островные, не представляющие ценности районы. Увы, под ударом также оказались сельскохозяйственные установки и мощности колонии.

languages.text: To ensure that the defeat in the jungle did not descend into a military catastrophe, the ever wise Lord Captain gave the timely order for the targeted orbital bombardment of the planet. The merciless strikes vaporised the rebel clusters, forcing them to retreat to island regions of no economic value. Alas, the colony's agricultural infrastructure and facilities also fell victim to the bombing.

Безжалостные удары обратили в пар скопления повстанцев, вынудив их отступить в островные, не представляющие ценности районы. Увы, под ударом также оказались сельскохозяйственные установки и мощности колонии.

The merciless strikes vaporized the rebel clusters, forcing them to retreat to island regions of no economic value. Alas, the colony's agricultural infrastructure and facilities also fell victim to the bombing.

Alas, the colony's agricultural infrastructure and facilities also fell victim to the bombing.

To ensure that the defeat in the jungle did not descend into a military catastrophe, the ever wise Lord Captain gave the timely order for the targeted orbital bombardment of the planet. The merciless strikes vaporised the rebel clusters, forcing them to retreat to island regions of no economic value. Alas, the colony's agricultural infrastructure and facilities also fell victim to the bombing.

languages.text: ジャングルでの敗北が軍事的壊滅にいたらぬよう、深慮備えしロード・キャプテンは時分を見計らい、標的がいる惑星への軌道砲撃命令を出した。無慈悲な攻撃が反乱軍の拠点を蒸発させ、彼らを経済的価値のない離島地域へと撤退させた。惜しむべくは、コロニーの農業インフラと施設も砲撃の犠牲となった点だ。
languages.original_text: To ensure that the defeat in the jungle did not descend into a military catastrophe, the ever wise Lord Captain gave the timely order for the targeted orbital bombardment of the planet. The merciless strikes vaporised the rebel clusters, forcing them to retreat to island regions of no economic value. Alas, the colony's agricultural infrastructure and facilities also fell victim to the bombing.

traits.locale_text: ジャングルでの敗北が軍事的壊滅にいたらぬよう、深慮備えしロード・キャプテンは時分を見計らい、標的がいる惑星への軌道砲撃命令を出した。無慈悲な攻撃が反乱軍の拠点を蒸発させ、彼らを経済的価値のない離島地域へと撤退させた。惜しむべくは、コロニーの農業インフラと施設も砲撃の犠牲となった点だ。

languages.text: 为了确保丛林行动的失利不会演变成一场军事灾难，一向睿智的舰长大人及时下达命令，要求对行星进行定点轨道轰炸。轨道轰炸无情地消灭了叛军集群，迫使他们撤退到没有任何经济价值的岛屿地区。但遗憾的是，殖民地的农业基础设施与相关设备，也沦为了轰炸的牺牲品。
languages.original_text: To ensure that the defeat in the jungle did not descend into a military catastrophe, the ever wise Lord Captain gave the timely order for the targeted orbital bombardment of the planet. The merciless strikes vaporised the rebel clusters, forcing them to retreat to island regions of no economic value. Alas, the colony's agricultural infrastructure and facilities also fell victim to the bombing.

traits.locale_text: 为了确保丛林行动的失利不会演变成一场军事灾难，一向睿智的舰长大人及时下达命令，要求对行星进行定点轨道轰炸。轨道轰炸无情地消灭了叛军集群，迫使他们撤退到没有任何经济价值的岛屿地区。但遗憾的是，殖民地的农业基础设施与相关设备，也沦为了轰炸的牺牲品。

languages.text: Para garantizar que la derrota en la jungla no deviniese en una catástrofe militar, {mf|el juicioso Lord Capitán|la juiciosa Lord Capitán} ordenó un bombardeo orbital del planeta. Los implacables proyectiles vaporizaron los reductos rebeldes, obligándolos a retirarse a regiones insulares de nulo valor económico. Por desgracia, la infraestructura y las instalaciones agrícolas de la colonia también resultaron destruidas por la andanada.
languages.original_text: To ensure that the defeat in the jungle did not descend into a military catastrophe, the ever wise Lord Captain gave the timely order for the targeted orbital bombardment of the planet. The merciless strikes vaporised the rebel clusters, forcing them to retreat to island regions of no economic value. Alas, the colony's agricultural infrastructure and facilities also fell victim to the bombing.

traits.locale_text: Para garantizar que la derrota en la jungla no deviniese en una catástrofe militar, {mf|el juicioso Lord Capitán|la juiciosa Lord Capitán} ordenó un bombardeo orbital del planeta. Los implacables proyectiles vaporizaron los reductos rebeldes, obligándolos a retirarse a regiones insulares de nulo valor económico. Por desgracia, la infraestructura y las instalaciones agrícolas de la colonia también resultaron destruidas por la andanada.

languages.text: Damit sich die Niederlage im Dschungel nicht zu einer militärischen Katastrophe auswuchs, erteilte der stets besonnene Lord Captain rechtzeitig den Befehl zu einer gezielten Bombardierung des Planeten aus dem Orbit. Der gnadenlose Angriff pulverisierte die Rebellennester und zwang den Fend, sich in Inselregionen ohne wirtschaftlichen Wert zurückzuziehen. Leider fielen die landwirtschaftliche Infrastruktur und die Industrieanlagen den Bomben ebenfalls zum Opfer.
languages.original_text: To ensure that the defeat in the jungle did not descend into a military catastrophe, the ever wise Lord Captain gave the timely order for the targeted orbital bombardment of the planet. The merciless strikes vaporised the rebel clusters, forcing them to retreat to island regions of no economic value. Alas, the colony's agricultural infrastructure and facilities also fell victim to the bombing.

traits.locale_text: Damit sich die Niederlage im Dschungel nicht zu einer militärischen Katastrophe auswuchs, erteilte der stets besonnene Lord Captain rechtzeitig den Befehl zu einer gezielten Bombardierung des Planeten aus dem Orbit. Der gnadenlose Angriff pulverisierte die Rebellennester und zwang den Fend, sich in Inselregionen ohne wirtschaftlichen Wert zurückzuziehen. Leider fielen die landwirtschaftliche Infrastruktur und die Industrieanlagen den Bomben ebenfalls zum Opfer.

languages.text: Pour éviter que cette défaite dans la jungle ne se transforme en catastrophe militaire, {mf|le très sage seigneur-capitaine|la très sage seigneure-capitaine} donna rapidement l'ordre de lancer un bombardement orbital ciblé sur la planète. Ces frappes sans pitié firent voler en éclats les noyaux rebelles, les forçant à se replier vers des îles sans valeur économique. Malheureusement, les bâtiments et infrastructures agricoles de la colonie furent eux aussi détruits.
languages.original_text: To ensure that the defeat in the jungle did not descend into a military catastrophe, the ever wise Lord Captain gave the timely order for the targeted orbital bombardment of the planet. The merciless strikes vaporised the rebel clusters, forcing them to retreat to island regions of no economic value. Alas, the colony's agricultural infrastructure and facilities also fell victim to the bombing.

traits.locale_text: Pour éviter que cette défaite dans la jungle ne se transforme en catastrophe militaire, {mf|le très sage seigneur-capitaine|la très sage seigneure-capitaine} donna rapidement l'ordre de lancer un bombardement orbital ciblé sur la planète. Ces frappes sans pitié firent voler en éclats les noyaux rebelles, les forçant à se replier vers des îles sans valeur économique. Malheureusement, les bâtiments et infrastructures agricoles de la colonie furent eux aussi détruits.

languages.text: Ormandaki yenilginin askerî bir felakete dönüşmemesi için bilge Lord Kaptan, gezegenin yörüngeden bombalanması emrini verdi. Art arda yapılan saldırılarla isyancı birlikler alaşağı edildi. Geri kalanlar ekonomik değeri olmayan adalara çekilmek zorunda kaldı. Pek tabii kolonin tarımsal altyapısı ve tesisleri de bombalamada zarar gördü.
languages.original_text: To ensure that the defeat in the jungle did not descend into a military catastrophe, the ever wise Lord Captain gave the timely order for the targeted orbital bombardment of the planet. The merciless strikes vaporised the rebel clusters, forcing them to retreat to island regions of no economic value. Alas, the colony's agricultural infrastructure and facilities also fell victim to the bombing.
